meanings.definition: A painful condition affecting the shins, typically caused by inflammation of the muscles and tendons.
meanings.sent1: After running too much, he developed a shinsplint that made walking difficult.
meanings.sent2: She had to wear special shoes to help with her shinsplint pain.
meanings.sent3: The shinsplint in his leg made him walk like a penguin, which looked funny.
meanings.sent4: Her shinsplint felt like a tiny hammer hitting her leg with each step.
meanings.sent5: The sharp pain of the shinsplint was a constant reminder of the need to rest.

meanings.definition: To experience pain in the shins while exercising.
meanings.sent1: During the marathon, she started to shinsplint and had to stop to stretch.
meanings.sent2: He tends to shinsplint whenever he tries to jog on hard surfaces.
meanings.sent3: The way he shinsplints every time he runs makes his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her shinsplinted legs felt like they were on fire after the intense workout.
meanings.sent5: The urge to shinsplint made him switch to swimming for a lower impact workout.
